subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Cornerback Jayron Hosley allowed big plays, and tailback David Wilson, Hosley’s teammate at Virginia Tech, was stopped on a key fourth down and finished with 55 yards on 12 carries.
snippet: Cornerback Jayron Hosley allowed big plays, and tailback David Wilson, Hosley’s teammate at Virginia Tech, was stopped on a key fourth down and finished with 55 yards on 12 carries.
